name: VerticalAlignment
desc: An alignment position along the vertical axis.

items.name: static let top: VerticalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the top edge of the view.

items.name: static let center: VerticalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the vertical center of the view.

items.name: static let bottom: VerticalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the bottom edge of the view.

items.name: static let firstTextBaseline: VerticalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the topmost text baseline view.

items.name: static let lastTextBaseline: VerticalAlignment
items.desc: A guide marking the bottom-most text baseline in a view.

items.name: init(AlignmentID.Type)
items.desc: Creates an instance with the given identifier.

items.name: static func == (VerticalAlignment, VerticalAlignment) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two vertical alignments are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two vertical alignments are unequal.
